definitions.title: adj.
definitions.body: on foot; &; ´[[אִישׁ ר]]: (after num.) footmen, esp. foot-soldiers, Ju Jdg 20:2, 2Sa 8:4 = 1Ch 18:4, 1Ch 19:18 ([[פָּרָשִׁים]] in ‖ 2Sa 10:18); elsewhere ´[[ר]]: as subst., usu. coll., of Isr. at Exod. Ex 12:37, Nu 11:21 (both JE); = foot-soldiery 1Sa 4:10, 1Sa 15:4, 2Sa 10:6, 1Ki 20:29, 2Ki 13:7; n.pl. [[רַגְלִים]] footmen, men on foot Je 12:5 (opp. [[הַסּוּסִים]]).
